greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest product of n distinct primes of the form n*k + 1.
comment: Also the row products of triangle A077316.
Note that a(3) = 1729 is known as the Hardy-Ramanujan number.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
maple: Tj := proc(n,k) option remember: local j,p: if(k=0)then return 0:fi: for j from procname(n,k-1)+1 do if(isprime(n*j+1))then return j: fi: od: end: A193869 := proc(n) return mul(n*Tj(n,k)+1,k=1..n): end: seq(A193869(n),n=1..15); # _Nathaniel Johnston_, Sep 02 2011
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 01 2011
